page.title: 11BANKING IN EVERCREECH
page.content:
BANKING IN EVERCREECH There are two banks in Evercreech {(Lloyds and National_Westminster).} The first bank to open in Evercreech was{Lloyds}in 1922.The banks have changed a lot since then,{Lloyds}has a computer and is on different premises and{Nat-West}has changed the arrangements in the bank around.Only half the amount of people use{Nat-West {than Lloyds,}and nearly one hundred people use Lloyds. Most people think that Evercreech needs two banks.
BUILDING SOCIETY The Gateway Building Society recently opened a branch in the village.It is in a shop which used to be a Grocers.
